root.name: Last Half of Darkness
root.description: Last Half of Darkness is an point and click horror adventure game, set in and the surroundings of an haunted mansion which the protagonist has inherited from their deceased aunt, who incidentally dabbled in witchcraft and voodoo magic. The player will have to explore the area in search of clues of what killed it's previous owner, and how to survive the many encounters with vampires, ghosts and other supernatural inhabitants of the mansion.The first part of the game was released as shareware in 1989, followed by the sequels Last Half of Darkness II (1990) and Last Half of Darkness 3 (1992). In 2000 a remake combining the first 3 games was released, simply titled The Last Half of Darkness.
